And<S>2532</S> he entered<S>1684</S> into<S>1519</S> a ship<S>4143</S>, and passed over<S>1276</S>, and<S>2532</S> came<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> his own<S>2398</S> city<S>4172</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, they brought<S>4374</S> to him<S>846</S> a man sick of the palsy<S>3885</S>, lying<S>906</S> on<S>1909</S> a bed<S>2825</S>: and<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> seeing<S>1492</S> their<S>846</S> faith<S>4102</S> said<S>2036</S> unto the sick of the palsy<S>3885</S>; Son<S>5043</S>, be of good cheer<S>2293</S>; thy<S>4675</S> sins<S>266</S> be forgiven<S>863</S> thee<S>4671</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, certain<S>5100</S> of the scribes<S>1122</S> said<S>2036</S> within<S>1722</S> themselves<S>1438</S>, This<S>3778</S> man blasphemeth<S>987</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> knowing<S>1492</S> their<S>846</S> thoughts<S>1761</S> said<S>2036</S>, Wherefore<S>2444</S> think<S>1760</S> ye<S>5210</S> evil<S>4190</S> in<S>1722</S> your<S>5216</S> hearts<S>2588</S>?
For<S>1063</S> whether<S>5101</S> is<S>2076</S> easier<S>2123</S>, to say<S>2036</S>, Thy sins<S>266</S> be forgiven<S>863</S> thee<S>4671</S>; or<S>2228</S> to say<S>2036</S>, Arise<S>1453</S>, and<S>2532</S> walk<S>4043</S>?
But<S>1161</S> that<S>2443</S> ye may know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> hath<S>2192</S> power<S>1849</S> on<S>1909</S> earth<S>1093</S> to forgive<S>863</S> sins<S>266</S>, (then<S>5119</S> saith he<S>3004</S> to the sick of the palsy<S>3885</S>,) Arise<S>1453</S>, take up<S>142</S> thy<S>4675</S> bed<S>2825</S>, and<S>2532</S> go<S>5217</S> unto<S>1519</S> thine<S>4675</S> house<S>3624</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he arose<S>1453</S>, and departed<S>565</S> to<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3624</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when the multitudes<S>3793</S> saw<S>1492</S> it, they marvelled<S>2296</S>, and<S>2532</S> glorified<S>1392</S> God<S>2316</S>, which<S>3588</S> had given<S>1325</S> such<S>5108</S> power<S>1849</S> unto men<S>444</S>.
And as<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> passed forth<S>3855</S> from thence<S>1564</S>, he saw<S>1492</S> a man<S>444</S>, named<S>3004</S> Matthew<S>3156</S>, sitting<S>2521</S> at<S>1909</S> the receipt of custom<S>5058</S>: and<S>2532</S> he saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Follow<S>190</S> me<S>3427</S>. And<S>2532</S> he arose<S>450</S>, and followed<S>190</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S>, as Jesus<S>2424</S> sat at meat<S>345</S> in<S>1722</S> the house<S>3614</S>,<S>2532</S> behold<S>2400</S>, many<S>4183</S> publicans<S>5057</S> and<S>2532</S> sinners<S>268</S> came<S>2064</S> and sat down<S>4873</S> with him<S>846</S> and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when the Pharisees<S>5330</S> saw<S>1492</S> it, they said<S>2036</S> unto his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, Why<S>1302</S> eateth<S>2068</S> your<S>5216</S> Master<S>1320</S> with<S>3326</S> publicans<S>5057</S> and<S>2532</S> sinners<S>268</S>?
But<S>1161</S> when Jesus<S>2424</S> heard<S>191</S> that, he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, They that be<S>2192</S> whole<S>2480</S> need<S>5532</S> not<S>3756</S> a physician<S>2395</S>, but<S>235</S> they that are<S>2192</S> sick<S>2560</S>.
But<S>1161</S> go ye<S>4198</S> and learn<S>3129</S> what<S>5101</S> that meaneth<S>2076</S>, I will<S>2309</S> have mercy<S>1656</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3756</S> sacrifice<S>2378</S>: for<S>1063</S> I am<S>2064</S> not<S>3756</S> come<S>2064</S> to call<S>2564</S> the righteous<S>1342</S>, but<S>235</S> sinners<S>268</S> to<S>1519</S> repentance<S>3341</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> came<S>4334</S> to him<S>846</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> of John<S>2491</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Why<S>1302</S> do we<S>2249</S> and<S>2532</S> the Pharisees<S>5330</S> fast<S>3522</S> oft<S>4183</S>, but<S>1161</S> thy<S>4675</S> disciples<S>3101</S> fast<S>3522</S> not<S>3756</S>?
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Can<S>3361</S> <S>1410</S> the children<S>5207</S> of the bridechamber<S>3567</S> mourn<S>3996</S>, as long as<S>1909</S> <S>3745</S> the bridegroom<S>3566</S> is<S>2076</S> with<S>3326</S> them<S>846</S>? but<S>1161</S> the days<S>2250</S> will come<S>2064</S>, when<S>3752</S> the bridegroom<S>3566</S> shall be taken<S>522</S> from<S>575</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> then<S>5119</S> shall they fast<S>3522</S>.
<S>1161</S> No man<S>3762</S> putteth<S>1911</S> a piece<S>1915</S> of new<S>46</S> cloth<S>4470</S> unto<S>1909</S> an old<S>3820</S> garment<S>2440</S>, for<S>1063</S> that which is put in to fill it up<S>4138</S> taketh<S>142</S> <S>846</S> from<S>575</S> the garment<S>2440</S>, and<S>2532</S> the rent<S>4978</S> is made<S>1096</S> worse<S>5501</S>. <sup>new: or, raw, or, unwrought</sup>
Neither<S>3761</S> do men put<S>906</S> new<S>3501</S> wine<S>3631</S> into<S>1519</S> old<S>3820</S> bottles<S>779</S>: else<S>1490</S> the bottles<S>779</S> break<S>4486</S>, and<S>2532</S> the wine<S>3631</S> runneth out<S>1632</S>, and<S>2532</S> the bottles<S>779</S> perish<S>622</S>: but<S>235</S> they put<S>906</S> new<S>3501</S> wine<S>3631</S> into<S>1519</S> new<S>2537</S> bottles<S>779</S>, and<S>2532</S> both<S>297</S> are preserved<S>4933</S>. <sup>bottles: or, sacks of skin, or, leather</sup>
While he<S>846</S> spake<S>2980</S> these things<S>5023</S> unto them<S>846</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, there came<S>2064</S> a certain<S>1520</S> ruler<S>758</S>, and worshipped<S>4352</S> him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> My<S>3450</S> daughter<S>2364</S> is even now<S>737</S> dead<S>5053</S>: but<S>235</S> come<S>2064</S> and lay<S>2007</S> thy<S>4675</S> hand<S>5495</S> upon<S>1909</S> her<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> she shall live<S>2198</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> arose<S>1453</S>, and followed<S>190</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> so did his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, a woman<S>1135</S>, which was diseased with an issue of blood<S>131</S> twelve<S>1427</S> years<S>2094</S>, came<S>4334</S> behind<S>3693</S> him, and touched<S>680</S> the hem<S>2899</S> of his<S>846</S> garment<S>2440</S>:
For<S>1063</S> she said<S>3004</S> within<S>1722</S> herself<S>1438</S>, If<S>1437</S> I may<S>680</S> but<S>3440</S> touch<S>680</S> his<S>846</S> garment<S>2440</S>, I shall be whole<S>4982</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> turned him about<S>1994</S>, and<S>2532</S> when he saw<S>1492</S> her<S>846</S>, he said<S>2036</S>, Daughter<S>2364</S>, be of good comfort<S>2293</S>; thy<S>4675</S> faith<S>4102</S> hath made<S>4982</S> thee<S>4571</S> whole<S>4982</S>. And<S>2532</S> the woman<S>1135</S> was made whole<S>4982</S> from<S>575</S> that<S>1565</S> hour<S>5610</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when Jesus<S>2424</S> came<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> the ruler's<S>758</S> house<S>3614</S>, and<S>2532</S> saw<S>1492</S> the minstrels<S>834</S> and<S>2532</S> the people<S>3793</S> making a noise<S>2350</S>,
He said<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Give place<S>402</S>: for<S>1063</S> the maid<S>2877</S> is<S>599</S> not<S>3756</S> dead<S>599</S>, but<S>235</S> sleepeth<S>2518</S>. And<S>2532</S> they laughed<S>2606</S> him<S>846</S> to scorn<S>2606</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when<S>3753</S> the people<S>3793</S> were put forth<S>1544</S>, he went in<S>1525</S>, and took<S>2902</S> her<S>846</S> by the hand<S>5495</S>, and<S>2532</S> the maid<S>2877</S> arose<S>1453</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the fame<S>5345</S> hereof<S>3778</S> went abroad<S>1831</S> into<S>1519</S> all<S>3650</S> that<S>1565</S> land<S>1093</S>. <sup>the fame: or, this fame</sup>
And<S>2532</S> when Jesus<S>2424</S> departed<S>3855</S> thence<S>1564</S>, two<S>1417</S> blind men<S>5185</S> followed<S>190</S> him<S>846</S>, crying<S>2896</S>, and<S>2532</S> saying<S>3004</S>, Thou Son<S>5207</S> of David<S>1138</S>, have mercy<S>1653</S> on us<S>2248</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when he was come<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> the house<S>3614</S>, the blind men<S>5185</S> came<S>4334</S> to him<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Believe ye<S>4100</S> that<S>3754</S> I am able<S>1410</S> to do<S>4160</S> this<S>5124</S>? They said<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Yea<S>3483</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> touched he<S>680</S> their<S>846</S> eyes<S>3788</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, According<S>2596</S> to your<S>5216</S> faith<S>4102</S> be it<S>1096</S> unto you<S>5213</S>.
And<S>2532</S> their<S>846</S> eyes<S>3788</S> were opened<S>455</S>; and<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> straitly charged<S>1690</S> them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, See<S>3708</S> that no man<S>3367</S> know<S>1097</S> it.
But<S>1161</S> they, when they were departed<S>1831</S>, spread abroad<S>1310</S> his<S>846</S> fame<S>1310</S> in<S>1722</S> all<S>3650</S> that<S>1565</S> country<S>1093</S>.
As<S>1161</S> they<S>846</S> went out<S>1831</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, they brought<S>4374</S> to him<S>846</S> a dumb<S>2974</S> man<S>444</S> possessed with a devil<S>1139</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when the devil<S>1140</S> was cast out<S>1544</S>, the dumb<S>2974</S> spake<S>2980</S>: and<S>2532</S> the multitudes<S>3793</S> marvelled<S>2296</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> It was never<S>3763</S> so<S>3779</S> seen<S>5316</S> in<S>1722</S> Israel<S>2474</S>.
But<S>1161</S> the Pharisees<S>5330</S> said<S>3004</S>, He casteth out<S>1544</S> devils<S>1140</S> through<S>1722</S> the prince<S>758</S> of the devils<S>1140</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> went about<S>4013</S> all<S>3956</S> the cities<S>4172</S> and<S>2532</S> villages<S>2968</S>, teaching<S>1321</S> in<S>1722</S> their<S>846</S> synagogues<S>4864</S>, and<S>2532</S> preaching<S>2784</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> of the kingdom<S>932</S>, and<S>2532</S> healing<S>2323</S> every<S>3956</S> sickness<S>3554</S> and<S>2532</S> every<S>3956</S> disease<S>3119</S> among<S>1722</S> the people<S>2992</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when he saw<S>1492</S> the multitudes<S>3793</S>, he was moved with compassion<S>4697</S> on<S>4012</S> them<S>846</S>, because<S>3754</S> they fainted<S>2258</S> <S>1590</S>, and<S>2532</S> were scattered abroad<S>4496</S>, as<S>5616</S> sheep<S>4263</S> having<S>2192</S> no<S>3361</S> shepherd<S>4166</S>. <sup>fainted: or, were tired and lay down</sup>
Then<S>5119</S> saith<S>3004</S> he unto his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, The harvest<S>2326</S> truly<S>3303</S> is plenteous<S>4183</S>, but<S>1161</S> the labourers<S>2040</S> are few<S>3641</S>;
Pray ye<S>1189</S> therefore<S>3767</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> of the harvest<S>2326</S>, that<S>3704</S> he will send forth<S>1544</S> labourers<S>2040</S> into<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> harvest<S>2326</S>.
